name: Severstal
description: Severstal is a leading Russian steel and mining company, recognized for its commitment to high-quality production and sustainable practices in the steel sector. Founded in 1955, Severstal has evolved into one of the largest steel producers in Russia and is a major player in the global steel market. The company operates steel mills and mining facilities, producing a wide range of steel products including hot-rolled, cold-rolled, and galvanized sheets, as well as long products and specialty steel. Severstal's production facilities are equipped with advanced technologies that enhance efficiency and environmental sustainability. The company is dedicated to reducing its carbon footprint and has implemented numerous initiatives aimed at energy efficiency and resource conservation. In addition to steel production, Severstal also engages in the extraction of iron ore and coal, securing raw material supplies to support its manufacturing operations. With a strong emphasis on innovation and quality, Severstal aims to meet the evolving demands of its customers across various industries, including construction, automotive, and energy. The company’s global reach is complemented by its commitment to corporate social responsibility, actively contributing to the communities it operates in and promoting a safe working environment for its employees.
